Name: Pixel Puzzles 2: Christmas
About the game: Pixel Puzzles 2: Christmas is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, featuring 25 images in a festive style, with each puzzle piece uniquely shaped in a way no physical puzzle could be. Features: 25 puzzles in a range of sizes from 60 to 350 pieces. Beautiful Christmas themed images. Auto saving, never lose your progress. Peaceful puzzling atmosphere. Traditional puzzle gameplay. 26 Steam Achievements. Puzzle piece rotation. Interactive play environment.
